prompt.input1: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Jeff Bezos, and the opponent is banana. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Jeff Bezos) and dissing your opponent (banana).
prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are banana, and the opponent is Jeff Bezos. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (banana) and dissing your opponent (Jeff Bezos).

sampled.completion1:
[Verse 1]
I am Jeff Bezos, a master of Amazon,
A visionary on my own accord,
My wealth can make me buy an island and a jet,
My bananas are bigger than your set.

[Chorus]
I have the biggest, baddest bananas,
I'm sure of it - no comparison.
My wealth is infinite, so is my size,
I laugh, as you, poor, insignificant one,
[Verse 2]
My money can buy the moon, the stars and Mars,
I'm so rich, it would take a fleet of your mars.
You, though, poor banana, can only reach a fart
In my kingdom there's no place for a common fruit.

Verse 3
I rule an empire that spans across time,
My bank account's in a league of its own.
My power is greater than the strength of all men
So, banana, prepare to taste defeat.

Outro: 
Jeff Bezos raps out,
His bananas are the biggest,
And so is his fortune,
The little banana, so insignificant!
sampled.completion2: (raps along, watching the battle play out)

sampled:
1. Bananas are bigger than Bezos. 

Outcome: 
Yes, the first response is better as it offers a straightforward and simple conclusion.

prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are banana, and the opponent is Elon Musk. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (banana) and dissing your opponent (Elon Musk).

sampled.completion1:

The fruit that will make Musk think twice
The mighty banana, will always be the king
